SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.strategy.movement

Class MultiPhaseBossMovementStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.strategy.movement.MultiPhaseBossMovementStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovementStrategy
public class MultiPhaseBossMovementStrategy extends Object implements MovementStrategy
The MultiPhaseBossMovementStrategy class implements the MovementStrategy interface and defines the movement behavior for a multi-phase boss in a game. The boss has different movement patterns based on its current phase.

Phases:

  • Phase 1: Horizontal movement
  • Phase 2: Sine wave movement
  • Phase 3: Alternates between horizontal and sine wave movement

The movement strategy also includes boundary checking to ensure the boss stays within defined bounds and reverses direction if necessary.

  • Constructor Details

    • MultiPhaseBossMovementStrategy

      public MultiPhaseBossMovementStrategy(int speed)
      Constructs a new MultiPhaseBossMovementStrategy with initial settings. Initializes the movement strategy for a multi-phase boss character in the game. Sets the initial phase to 1, records the spawn time, and sets the initial movement state to horizontal. Also initializes the movement frame count and sets the horizontal and vertical velocities for phase 1. The sine wave base X position is also initialized.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(FighterPlane plane, long now)
      Moves the fighter plane based on the current phase of the boss.
      Specified by:
      move in interface MovementStrategy
      Parameters:
      plane - the fighter plane to be moved
      now - the current time in nanoseconds The movement strategy changes based on the current phase: - Phase 1: Moves the plane horizontally. - Phase 2: Moves the plane in a sine wave pattern. - Phase 3: Alternates between horizontal and sine wave movement. Additionally, the method ensures the plane remains within the game boundaries.

    • handlePhaseTransition

      private void handlePhaseTransition(FighterPlane plane)
      Handles phase transitions by adjusting the plane's position if necessary.
      Parameters:
      plane - the FighterPlane instance to adjust

    • moveInSineWavePattern

      private void moveInSineWavePattern(FighterPlane plane, long now)
      Moves the given FighterPlane in a sine wave pattern horizontally and updates its vertical position based on a constant velocity.
      Parameters:
      plane - the FighterPlane to be moved
      now - the current time in nanoseconds

    • handlePhase3Movement

      private void handlePhase3Movement(FighterPlane plane, long now)
      Handles the movement of the fighter plane during phase 3. Depending on the current movement state, the plane will either move horizontally or in a sine wave pattern. The movement state is toggled after a certain number of frames. Additionally, if the plane is in SINE state and goes out of horizontal bounds, it immediately switches back to HORIZONTAL state and resets the movement frame count.
      Parameters:
      plane - The fighter plane whose movement is being controlled.
      now - The current time in nanoseconds.

    • toggleMovementState

      private void toggleMovementState()
      Toggles the movement state of the boss between horizontal and sine wave patterns. If the current movement state is horizontal, it switches to sine wave. If the current movement state is sine wave, it switches to horizontal.

    • isOutOfBounds

      private boolean isOutOfBounds(FighterPlane plane)
      Checks if the given FighterPlane is out of the defined bounds.
      Parameters:
      plane - the FighterPlane to check
      Returns:
      true if the plane is out of bounds, false otherwise

    • isOutOfHorizontalBounds

      private boolean isOutOfHorizontalBounds(FighterPlane plane)
      Checks if the plane is out of horizontal bounds.
      Parameters:
      plane - the FighterPlane to check
      Returns:
      true if the plane is out of horizontal bounds, false otherwise

    • constrainWithinBounds

      private void constrainWithinBounds(FighterPlane plane)
      Constrains the given FighterPlane within the specified bounds. If the plane's current position exceeds the defined upper or lower bounds for either the X or Y coordinates, the corresponding velocity is reversed, and the plane's position is adjusted to lie within the bounds.
      Parameters:
      plane - the FighterPlane to be constrained within bounds

    • updatePhase

      public void updatePhase(int newPhase)
      Updates the current phase of the boss and adjusts its movement parameters accordingly.
      Parameters:
      newPhase - the new phase to set for the boss. Valid values are: 1 - Default phase with horizontal movement only. 2 - Phase with specific horizontal and vertical velocities, and sine wave movement. 3 - Phase with specific horizontal velocity and additional adjustments if necessary.

    • adjustPlanePositionForSineWave

      private void adjustPlanePositionForSineWave(FighterPlane plane)
      Adjusts the plane's X position to a safe range to perform sine wave movement without going out of bounds.
      Parameters:
      plane - the FighterPlane to adjust
